short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension to hide the time tracked, helpful when sharing screen with clients and don't want them to see how much time you spent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to hide the time tracked, helpful when sharing screen with clients and you don't want them to see how much time you spent on a task.
